Event Place: Commonwealth Games Village, Near Akchardham Mandir, Delhi
Event DEscription:
14th January 2021 saw the FRESH START of one of the oldest cycling clubs of Delhi - the EAST DELHI RYDERZ (EDR). Since then, we have only seen the group grow and prosper - daily rides, fresh faces, super-charged ride responsibles, first century ride, the EDR Biggie 200km supported ride, the Wednesday Fitness Paathshala and the monthly RISING STAR Challenge!

What is the RISING STAR Challenge?
It is a monthly challenge to find and felicitate :
i) the most consistent rider and
ii)the rider who covers the maximum distance in a month in EDR group ride

To promote active participation and bonding of riders and to celebrate fitness, we cordially invite all fitness freaks to MILAN 1.0 - EDR MEET AND FELICITATION PROGRAM!

So do join in in large numbers in this jashn of sorts to inspire and be inspired!

Event Venue - CWG Village Road 
Event will start at 07:30am

"No Entry Fee Involved"

Regards 
Team EDR
East Delhi Ryderz

? फागुन के रंग मित्रों के संग ?
सभी के दिलों में रंगों के त्योहार होली का एक अलग ही स्वरूप रहता है। यह स्वरूप सभी को आपस में जोड़ने, पुराने वैर भाव भुलाने, एक दूसरे को गले लगाने और अपने प्रेम के रंग से सभी को सराबोर करने से लेकर हुडदंग, मस्ती, नाच गाना, हास्य व्यंग व मजेदार व्यंजनों के स्वाद तक फैला है। आपसी भाईचारे और हंसी खुशी के इन्ही रंगों को बिखेरने विस्तार आने वाली 28 मार्च को होली के पावन उत्सव की परिकल्पना को साकार रूप देने का अवसर आपको देते हुए होली मधुर मिलन समारोह
⭐ फागुन के रंग मित्रों के संग ⭐
मनाने जा रहा है। 
कार्यक्रम स्कूल प्रांगण में सुबह 10 बजे से निश्चित किया गया है।
अपने आप में अनूठा यह कार्यक्रम मस्ती, चुहल, धमाल, कमाल और शरारत से भरा रहेगा।
आप सभी से निवेदन है कि होली मधुर मिलन की इस पावन बेला पर अवश्य पधारें। 
? आप सभी सस्नेह आमंत्रित हैं। ?
आपकी उपस्थिति विस्तार द्वारा बुनी जा रही स्मृतियों में एक और मधुर स्मृति संजो देगी।
धन्यवाद 
कार्यकारिणी समूह
विस्तार

Voice Aroma brings an open mic on 28th of march 21 in ArtBuzz studios Okhla NewDelhi.

Event Place: Sangeeta Gupta Art Gallary A1/232 Safdarjung Enclave
Event DEscription: All through March we are celebrating International Women's Day (8th Mar) with Walks/Talks/Cultural Baithaks as part of the “जहान-ए-ज़न – World of Women" Event Series to re-discover stories and re-claim experiences that are an indelible testimony to the impact of women who have helped shape Indian society in the past and continue to inspire us in the present...So join the fun!----------------------------------------------------------------------------EVENT #4: SPIRIT OF WOMEN AND WOMENHOOD IN INDIAN LITERATURE"तू हक़ीक़त भी है दिलचस्प कहानी ही नहींतेरी हस्ती भी है इक चीज़ जवानी ही नहींअपनी तारीख़ का उन्वान बदलना है तुझेउठ मिरी जान मिरे साथ ही चलना है तुझे"[उन्वान = heading/title]~~~ Kaifi Azmi (poem: Aurat)With his progressive writing poet Kaifi Azmi penned this ever inspiring poem to motivate women to match steps with men. Over centuries women have been part of all forms of art. Though it is very recently that progressive and strength-rousing poems have started finding space in literary work. So join us as we gather to celebrate the womanhood in literature works of women for women and works by women!HIGHLIGHTS OF THE EVENT:- Work and life of women poets including but not limited to Amrita Pritam Meena Kumari Mahadevi Verma and others- Dramatised readings of short stories by Ismat Chugtai and Shivani.- Women in literature of Tagore Gulzar and other authors- Open Mic inviting select set of participants to share their own inspiring stories/poems. (Please send a mail to <ZWsgISBwYXJ3YXogfCBnbWFpbCAhIGNvbQ==> with details of what you wish to present)Inviting all literature lovers connoisseurs and enthusiasts for an evening surrounded by the bold and beautiful words of sublimely gifted writers!!!DATE/DAY: 4:30 PM 28TH MAR SUNVENUE: Sangeeta Gupta Art Gallery A1/232 Safdarjung EnclaveCONTRIBUTION: Rs 500/- per person* (inclusive of tea/refreshments).* For students' and senior citizen discount please write to us at ZWsgISBwYXJ3YXogfCBnbWFpbCAhIGNvbQ== OR ZXhwbG9yZSB8IGRlbGhpYnlmb290ICEgaW4=Reserve your spot @ https://www.payumoney.com/events/#/eventDetails/jahan.e.zanNOTE:1) The presentation will be done in Hindustani/English2) We have limited seats and prior booking is necessary.For any queries/clarifications call Priyanka@9810011955
